turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: Neo, please, you have to trust me.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: Because you've been down there, Neo. You already know that road.  You know exactly where it ends.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: And I know that's not where you want to be.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: We think you're bugged.  Try to relax.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Get this thing out of me!

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: It disables any electrical system in the blast radius.  It's the only weapon we have against the machines.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: I used to eat there... Really good noodles.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: That the Matrix cannot tell you who you are.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Nothing.  Just had a little deja vu.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: What happened?  What did you see?

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: A black cat went past us and then I saw another that looked just like it.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: How much like it?  Was it the same cat?

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: It might have been.  I'm not sure.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: A deju vu is usually a glitch in the Matrix.  It happens when they change something.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: I don't know.  It just went dead.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: There has to be something that we can do.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: That I would have to make a choice...

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: Morpheus sacrificed himself so we could get you out!  There's no way you're going back in!

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Morpheus did what he did because he believed that I'm something I'm not.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: I'm not the One, Trinity.  The Oracle hit me with that too.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: I'm sorry, I'm not.  I'm just another guy.  Morpheus is the one that matters.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: No, Neo.  That's not true.  It can't be true.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: I believe I can bring him back.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: No?  Let me tell you what I believe. I believe Morpheus means more to me than he does to you.  I believe that if you are serious about saving him then you are going to need my help and since I am the ranking officer on this ship, if you don't like it then I believe that you can go to hell, because you aren't going anywhere else.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: No one has ever done anything like this.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: Neo, how did you do that?

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: You moved like they moved.  I've never seen anyone move that fast.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: I'm fine.  Come on, we have to keep moving.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: You will tonight.  I guarantee it. I'm Tank.  I'll be your operator.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: Any holes?  Nope.  Me and my brother Dozer, we are 100 percent pure, old- fashioned, home-grown human.  Born free.  Right here in the real world. Genuine child of Zion.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: If this war ended tomorrow, Zion is where the party would be.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: The last human city.  The only place we got left.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: Deep underground.  Near the earth's core, where it's still warm.  You live long enough, you might even see it.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: Hey, Mikey, he likes it!  Ready for more?

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: What are they doing to him?

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: They inject virus-like serums to attack the neuro-systems.  It's like cracking a computer.  All it takes is time.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: Depends on the mind.  But eventually, it will crack and his alpha pattern will change from this to this.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: When it does, Morpheus will tell them anything they want to know.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: Every leader of every ship is given the codes to Zion's mainframe computer which can be accessed only through the Matrix.  They are used only in emergencies.  If an agent had those codes and got inside Zion's mainframe they could disable the entire defense system.  It would be the end of everything.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Goddamnit!  I don't believe this is happening!

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: Neo, this has to be done!

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Does it?  I don't know.  This can't be just coincidence.  It can't be! Can it?

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: The Oracle.  She told me this would happen.  She told me...

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: Neo, this is loco.  They've got Morpheus in a military-controlled building.  Even if you somehow got inside, those are agents holding him.  Three of them!  I want Morpheus back, too, but what you are talking about is suicide.

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: I know that's what it looks like, but it's not.  I can't logically explain to you why it's not. Morpheus believed something and he was ready to give his life for what he believed.  I understand that now. That's why I have to go.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: Okay.  Store's open.  What do you need?  Besides a miracle...

turns.speaker: NEO
turns.text: Mr. Wizard, get me the fuck out of here!

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: Kick it in!  Kick it in!

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: Yes.  They're moving him.  I don't know where yet.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: So did we.  I sent him to Franklin and Erie.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: There is.  We have to pull the plug.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: You're going to kill him?  Kill Morpheus?!

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: Trinity, we don't have any other choice.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: Tank, I need a pilot program for a military M-109 helicopter.

turns.speaker: TRINITY
turns.text: An Agent!  You have to send me back!

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: I don't know.  I lost him.

turns.speaker: TANK
turns.text: They've burned through the outer shields.

turns.speaker: BOY
turns.text: Yeah.  But he ain't here now.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: No, really, I liked it...thought it was great.

turns.speaker: BOY
turns.text: Well, we're here for about two weeks, then whatever else comes along... we're still working on our album and...

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Great...great...listen, I'm very interested in you guys because I'll be opening a new club myself soon... uptown...and maybe we can work something out...

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Of course, 'The Season of the Witch' won't be ready for a while yet but we have to keep in touch.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: It's obvious that the girl doesn't want to accompany you, isn't it?

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Whether she wants to or not...she's not going.

turns.speaker: BOY #1
turns.text: We went down to Chinatown but they don't have any.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Yeah, well, keep away from those Chinx.  They don't have shit.

turns.speaker: BOY #1
turns.text: Well, I don't know if we want to buy all $40 worth...

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Hey!  You want good stuff, or you want shit?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Well, maybe they do that in Riverdale, but down here we take cash.  Now, you got it or not?

turns.speaker: BOY #2
turns.text: Well the guy over there said...

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Yeah, yeah, never mind.  You gotta be careful.

turns.speaker: BOY #2
turns.text: Well, we got $40, and we wanna buy...

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: All right!  Quiet!  For $40 I could give you...

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Well, my stuff comes from Maryland... you know what that means?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Ok.  For another $5.00 a special on the packs.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Ok, you guys get out, and wait here for me.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Nobody sees where I get the stuff. That's good business.  I'll be back in thirty minutes.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Hey hold it!  Gimmie the cash.

turns.speaker: BOYS
turns.text: Uh...can we give you a check?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: A check?  What the...hey, where you kids from?

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: Keep quiet about this.  I don't have any license for him yet.  I've only had him a couple of days. Nobody can feed him except me.  I'm the only one he trusts.  Watch.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Don't go to any trouble.  We believe you... We believe you.

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: Really wanted to get a little tiger Charlie, y'know...a little William Blake and all that...

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: See what I mean?  A question please...'Is this what you call living?'

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: 'Take a little tip from Mack the Knife...'

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: And I wouldn't call it TONY'S PLACE or CHARLIE'S PLACE...  I'd call it something like SEASON OF THE WITCH... get it?

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: You are with out a doubt the biggest, most pretentious bullshit thrower I know.  Like to see what kind of business you'd do.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Look who's talking.  Pretentious bullshit.  Who's the guy with William Blake and the tigers, eh?

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: 'Art thou the King of the Jews'?

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: 'Dost thou say this of thyself, or have others told thee of me?'

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: 'My kingdom is not of this world. If my kingdom were of this world my followers would have fought that I might not be delivered to the Jews. But, as it is my kingdom is not from here.'

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: 'Thou sayest it; I am a king.  This is why I was born and why I have come into this world, to bear witness to the truth.  Everyone who is of the truth hears my voice.'

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: Prophesy to us, oh Christ!  Who is it that struck thee?

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I don't know, but God help him if he does it again!

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: Sure she is.  She's always in here with some different guy.  You know the way they are.

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: Get out of here before this really goes up.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Hide the gun.  Throw it away. Anything.  Listen, I gotta borrow your car...I think we should take a ride...away from here for the night...you know what I mean?

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: Ok...but go to a movie first or something...not good to be driving around right away.  You know you can't do much for him now...it's out of your hands.

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: I know, I know, stupid.  I mean where you goin'?

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: It's an open ticket.  I can go anywhere up to $350.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: So I'll send you a postcard from wherever.  If I get there.

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: Take it easy.  I only asked because maybe I could, you know, let you have a little something.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Yeah, well thanks, but I got enough to hold me.  My mother can send me some.  I don't know.

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: How about Teresa?  I could talk...

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Listen, I appreciate it, but I'll handle it myself.  I'll write.

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: Listen, try a place with some sun. Swimming pools.  Palm trees.  Girls in little French bathing suits.

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: Hey...no more good times like before.  Until you come back.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Sure.  And you're gonna take the vows next Tuesday, right.

turns.speaker: TONY
turns.text: Yeah, I'm gonna worry about you, too.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Next time, bet with your own kind.

turns.speaker: JIMMY
turns.text: The number was 235 - I bet it combination.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: It'll be OK - I know those guys. They won't stiff you.

turns.speaker: JIMMY
turns.text: I bet 235.  Because I dreamt of my grandfather - and when he died, the number of the funeral parlour was 235 - so when I dreamt...

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: Charlie, I swear on my mother, you're not going to believe this.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I know but let's hear it anyway.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: I swear to God Charlie, it's the truth.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: All right, forget it.  Tony, you got anything we can put on his face?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: Yes, you're gettin' it all over my tie.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: I don't think I should go home looking like this.  You think I could stay at your place tonight? Your mother's not there is she?

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: You'd better make a move kid.  He thinks you're trying to screw him.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Yeah, big man...get yourself in more trouble.  You make a fool out of him, you're doing the same to me. I signed for you don't forget.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: Don't worry.  I can handle it.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: You couldn't handle shit.  You just better come through with some kind of payment on Tuesday...anything. Understand?  Hold onto your pay- check this week.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: There won't be any this week.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: You sick or what?  You forget what we had to do to get you on the trucks, stupid?

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: You're not supposed to like it. What gets me is your attitude. Listen... tomorrow you show up.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: What about your attitude...Where's your job...eh?  You talk and talk and I go to work...what do you do?

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I'll tell you what I don't do... I don't owe anybody 2,000 clams plus interest, stupid.  Show up or I break both your arms, we understand each other?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: Ok, ok...take it easy.  I'll show. Tuesday I'll give Michael something. I promise.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: Ok, now that that's over with...what are you gonna make me for breakfast?

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I won't wait until Tuesday.  I'll break your arms right now.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I could have told you that.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: We'll get some food from my aunt's. I'll get in through the fire escape. She's always got something.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Cut it out stupid.  It's me.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: Hey...don't do that...I'm only scaring them.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Stupid bastard...you get your cousin half-sick over this.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: I swear to God Charlie...my arm still hurts from the car accident...that's why I didn't go to work.  I swear it.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: I'm going to work this week...I mean it.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: It's impossible for you to catch up on the loan now...the interest is going up...$3,000...do you realize that, flash?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: I'm sorry Charlie...I didn't mean it.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Big deal...in the meantime, it's done...I'll still try to help you out...You know that...but you gotta show some effort...some respect... understand?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: Charlie, you know the best way to take care of this whole mess.

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: If you had a little talk with your uncle...if anybody can do it, he can.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: That'll help you out fine.  That's the best way for you, not for me! I swear to God, I'll rip you open if my uncle ever hears a word about this.  You understand?  I don't care what happens, he doesn't find out.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I don't get involved with anything, you understand that?  Nothing!  I'm clean as far as you know...right?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: Yeah, take it easy.  Will you relax.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: That's what I get for getting involved.  Look, on pay-day at least show up at Tony's Place to meet him, ok?  This way he doesn't think that you're trying to screw him.  If you show good faith and save his face maybe we can talk and he'll take off the interest or make different payment arrangements or something... understand?  I'm not asking I'm telling you!!

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: You tell me that in front of these creeps?

turns.speaker: JOHNNY BOY
turns.text: Yeah, Teresa, shut up!  We don't wanna get Charlie here in trouble, do we?...We love Charlie.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Your cousin here was getting sick, worrying about you.  We've been in here calling...
